body_html:
@p-smirnov your suggestion worked for me as well. Had no issue building that branch. Thanks for the tip!

@guanan I just followed your suggestion (ran bazel clean before configure) and still got the same build error. Configure works fine, but running the build command results in the error message in my post.

body:
@p-smirnov your suggestion worked for me as well. Had no issue building that branch. Thanks for the tip!

@guanan I just followed your suggestion (ran bazel clean before configure) and still got the same build error. Configure works fine, but running the build command results in the error message in my post.
